Name: Name Change, Reverend Wesley G. Janzen Place, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, Reverend Wesley G. Janzen Place, Borough of The Bronx.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New namePresent nameLimitsReverend Wesley G. Janzen Place(None)Northeast corner at the intersection of 
White Plains Road and Gleason Avenue
ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.





_______
Note: Matter in italics is new; matter in brackets [ ] to be omitted.
